entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or ice pellets. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
